activities: Prompt, Incorporated (PromptIncCCR) does not collect or store, and thus can not/will not convey to agents or third parties, personal or identifiable information. Individuals accessing PromptIncCCR’s public internet presence do so in complete anonymity unless they elect to solicit more information about our products and services and intentionally compose an email to a PromptIncCCR email account. We respect the individual’s anonymity.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: We don't collect, store or convey personal information.
privacyprograms: On-going policy to promote data privacy awareness among customers.
